alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 2:15PM AKST until January 08 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Strong winds, snow and blowing snow expected with blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. Visibility could be less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast and Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts could form.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast
